perturbation.original_text: PlanetCAD shall not charge Dassault Systemes any hosting fee for the Co-Branded Service.
perturbation.changed_text: PlanetCAD will be compensated for providing the hosting services for the Co-Branded Service at a rate of $5,000 per month.
perturbation.explanation: The original text states PlanetCAD will not charge a hosting fee, while the modified version states they will receive $5,000 per month. This creates a direct contradiction about the financial terms of hosting, impacting the enforceability of either clause.

perturbation.original_text: Dassault Systemes shall indemnify and hold harmless PlanetCAD, and its officers, directors, employees, and shareholders from and against any claims, demands, suits, causes of action, losses, damages, judgments, costs and expenses (including reasonable attorneys' fees) arising out of or related to any breach of Dassault Systemes' representations, warranties and covenants set forth in this Agreement.
perturbation.changed_text: Dassault Systemes will not be liable to indemnify PlanetCAD for any indirect or consequential damages arising from breaches of warranty.
perturbation.explanation: The original text enforces an indemnification clause, protecting PlanetCAD, whereas the modified version exempts Dassault Systemes from liability related to breaches of warranty. This could lead to a dispute over the extent of Dassault Systemes' liability.

perturbation.original_text: Either party may terminate this Agreement at any time in the event that the other party is in default or breach of any material provision of this Agreement, and such default or breach continues unremedied for a period of sixty days after written notice thereof.
perturbation.changed_text: Either party may terminate this Agreement for any reason, or no reason, with thirty days written notice to the other party.
perturbation.explanation: The original text sets a condition for termination (material breach, unremedied within 60 days), whereas the modified version allows for termination at will with only 30 days' notice. This inconsistency significantly alters the stability and commitment of the agreement.
